title: My New School
description: In the book My New School, students will read about a girl's preschool and her new school. Will they be the same or different? Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast as well as use the information they already know about school. Detailed, supportive illustrations, repetitive sentence patterns, and high-frequency words support early readers.
